core.name: Vstavai!
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Vstavai!: MECH and PSY-type battlesuits deal 10.0% more DMG to shields.

subskills.name: Vstavai!
subskills.description: MECH and PSY-type characters deal 25.0% more DMG to shields.

core.name: Charged ATK: Sturmovik
core.description:
Perform a charged leap into the air for a Dive ATK.
At max Blitz Power (BP), tap and hold the [ATK] button to spend all KE, aim at the attack site, and release the [ATK] button to unleash Diving Ilyusha.
Diving Ilyusha: Deals 1000% ATK of Physical DMG and knocks enemies airborne.

subskills.name: Hardened Sabot
subskills.description: Charged ATK deals 50% more Physical DMG to shielded enemies.

subskills.name: Tactical Stance
subskills.description: After Charged ATK, character enters Tactical Buff that gives 25.0% faster Move Speed, 20.0% Total DMG Reduction, and Ignore Interrupt for 7s.

core.name: Passive
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically
Blitz Power (BP): SBattle starts with 1000 BP (max). BP recovers at 40/s.
First 3 sequences of Basic ATK restores 35 BP. 4th sequence and Ultimate Evasion restores 70 BP.

subskills.name: Maneuver Warfare
subskills.description: Character gains 40.0% Total DMG Multiplier against enemies affected by Weaken or Time Slow.

subskills.name: Full Mobilization
subskills.description: After entry, the first Charged ATK or Ultimate freezes enemies for 5s and inflicts 18 Rime Trauma. CD: 30s. Exiting boosts the next Valkyrie's Physical DMG by 15.0%. If Molotov Cherry is switched in next, her Ignore Interrupt also increases for 15s. CD: 20s.

core.name: We'll Bury You
core.description:
Adopt a DEF stance to negate incoming attacks.
Duration: 1.8s.When DEF Stance ends or when attacked during DEF Stance, Retaliation is triggered inflicting 550% + 400% ATK of Physical DMG and applies Weaken (deals 20% less DMG) to the enemy for 6s. If attacked immediately after taking DEF Stance, Retaliation EX is triggered, dealing 850% + 700% ATK of Physical DMG, proccing a brief Time Fracture and reducing Ultimate CD by 9s.

SP cost: 25. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Weakness Scan
subskills.description: After performing the Ultimate, character deals 50.0% more Physical DMG while Molotov Cherry deals 25.0% more Physical DMG for 30s. Triggering this again resets the duration.

subskills.name: Lethal Strike
subskills.description: Ultimate gains 40.0% Crit Rate and 60.0% Crit DMG.

core.name: Emergency Evasion
core.description:
Quickly evades enemy attack. Can be performed twice in a row.
Ultimate Evasion: Generates an Iron Curtain that hits enemies in the AOE, dealing 50% ATK of Physical DMG per 0.5s and pulling them in for 3s. Base CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Speedy Recovery
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasion by 3.00s.

subskills.name: Zamorozka Freeze
subskills.description: Iron Curtain also deals 30.0% ATK of Ice DMG for each hit.

core.name: Blitz Ataka
core.description:
Swing that greatsword!
1st Sequence: 150% ATK of Physical DMG. 2nd Sequence: 150% ATK of Physical DMG. 3rd Sequence: 150% + 3x100% ATK of Physical DMG. 4th Sequence: 2x100% + 300% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Flash Freeze
subskills.description: Each Basic ATK hit also deals 300.0 Ice DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Operation Gemina
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when enemy is knocked airborne or when teammate is hit (does not work in co-op/squad modes), dealing 3x150% + 300% ATK of Physical DMG. Heal Molotov Cherry for 300.0 HP if she is in the team.
